question: Which Indian state/UT was host to the BIMSTEC 'Conference on Combating Drug Trafficking'?
explanation:
The two-day BIMSTEC (Bay of Bengal Initiative for Multi-Sectoral Technical and Economic Cooperation) \'Conference on Combating Drug Trafficking\' was recently inaugurated in New Delhi.
The Narcotics Control Bureau (NCB) organised the conference, which was inaugurated by the Union Home Minister Amit Shah. Several delegations from the Partner Nations arrived in India to attend the conference.
